title.narrative: Landscapes Colombia

description.narrative: Colombia has vast land potential with exceptional diversity of landscapes and climate, an abundance of water and richness of natural resources has prioritized agriculture as a sector of strategic importance in Colombia’s post-conflict development plans. The strategic priorities are as follows: 1. Advancing a public private sector policy dialogue in both the targeted commodities and towards landscapes level approaches within the framework of the Colombia Partnership; 2. Improvements of income and sustainable practices for actors in the targeted commodities with better access to technical assistance, certification, markets and finance tools; 3. Demonstrate effective Landscape level approaches that deliver in vulnerable regions sustainable growth in agricultural production, protect the natural resources and include the producer communities and other stakeholders,
